camera.title: Smile
camera.description: Ensure your entire body is in the frame, then tap Continue
camera.wait: Once the countdown ends, turn your body slowly

preview.title: Your Photos
preview.description: We took these photos of you. Make sure they contain your body from multiple angles, then tap Next.

cardreader.title: Scan a card
cardreader.description: Scan a card to link your photos to that card. Alternatively, you can use your phone.
